name: Jay's Auto
description:
Use the left and right arrows keys to move the car. Drag the colored dots toward the car to change its color. Rims changes wheels and feel free to drag the red spoiler. Drag paints to the spoiler change the color of the spoiler.

Match your cars color and wheels to the car above to reset the room.

This game was made in a weekend, so the controls are a bit buggy. I hope you have fun.
